I-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:OverallWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:OverallDepth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcIShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
